net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_getInitiativeInput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: <html><pre>arg(0): TokenID Returns a String suitable for the Input command to prompt for the user's Initiative bonus and proficiency, if any. It will populate 'bonus.initiative' and 'initiativeProficiency' with one of '0', '1', '2', or '3', corresponding to the selected index of ARRY_PROF_VALUES
